website_summaries.verdict: Sparkle is known for its low-cost, no-nonsense paper towels that get the job done.
pros: Users who swear by Sparkle like that these economical paper towels simply clean up messes
The 18-pack lasts about three months on average if using one and a half rolls per week
cons: Sheets can be thinner and smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Awful Smell!
customer_reviews.text: The paper towel rolls despite being a trusted brand name, were limited in their use. I couldn't use them for the kitchen, dining room or living room. Each package smelled awful from a distance. I don't know how such a thing is possible. Each 3 pack is wrapped in plastic with no apparent tears/openings. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: meghan evans

customer_reviews.title: Why do these towels smell fishy!?!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because the price was right for the amount I was paying vs the amount I was receiving. Seemed like a great deal right? Wrong! These towels do not absorb liquid and they stink like they have sat in an Alaskan fishery for a year before they shipped them to me! DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Beadle

customer_reviews.title: Smells like urine
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute worst paper towels ever. They get a negative star! They smell like urine, seriously. I know that sounds crazy but my entire family of 5 agree. It is gross. I was going to return, but it is too much of a hassle. Use them for cleaning now as the smell does not matter. But, as for a quick napkin to wipe your mouth, absolutely NOT!!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3wifeof1:)

customer_reviews.title: Rolls missing from box.
customer_reviews.text: I have a subscription to this item. Somehow it is always delivered in a box with two packages (of 3 rolls) obviously missing. We’re only getting 12 rolls. So frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Uptown Girl- Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Not very absorbent and thin
customer_reviews.text: Not very absorbent. Sheets are very thin which causes you to need to use more. I would rather spend slightly more money for a better quality product
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: It’s so thin that we end up using more of these paper towels than our usual brand. Switching my subscribe & save to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Big Roll
customer_reviews.text: this is the second time we have ordered these and they are good value. these are good and strong paper towels and last awhile with pick a size. we thought we got a good deal when we ordered them, but drove over to dollar general and saw them a few$ cheaper. still a good deal compared to grocery store price. as of 8/19/20 I was going to order again but when I saw the price witch was 3 times as much as last order, will not reorder until price comes back down.
customer_reviews.author: DJSOUNDS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Odor
customer_reviews.text: This is my second shipment on a subscription to this product. Both orders, the paper towels have a fishy mildew smell. This is particularly unpleasant when using as napkins. I'm cancelling future orders. I think these are rejects that got damp and were packaged anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceCat

customer_reviews.title: Will not repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm a paper towel snob... I like thick and soft paper towels. My go to brands are viva or brawny, neither were in stock so I purchased these. 18 Rolls should last my family 3 months if not more. I see these disappearing in half the time. Given the covid19 crisis i can not be so picky but I would not repurchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Martin G.

customer_reviews.title: So thin.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would get a new brand to try out. These were on sale at Amazon Warehouse, so I picked up a couple boxes. They are SO much thinner than the Bounty I usually get and the rolls are loosely wrapped, too. I feel like these would qualify as a "bargain brand", instead of a major brand. I need more to get the same job done as with the Bounty I usually get. Just poor quality. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dead_Cow

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these in bulk over and over. 5 adults in my house and we use these on a daily basis for everything. Very absorbent and I love having the choice of small sizes when needed for little clean ups.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need!
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheap harsh paper towel which is exactly what I need it to be. Cleaning up paint line errors it is great. No smearing it all around. Pet messes, awesome. Can pick up soft solids like hair balls, stool & undigested foods without immediate absorbtion. This gives enough time to get the package into a waiting trash bag without getting wet hands. Can throw some on top of liquid messes and absorb those too. Have never used just one for a liquid mess. Feel less bad about using multiples of these. Because they are not super soft, they can be squeezed out a few times without falling apart immediately. Really like these a bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Swtchks

customer_reviews.title: Worst paper towels ever.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, tears every time I try getting a piece off. Very small amounts of water turn the whole thing into a wet mess. Water does not stay absorbed. You will use 30 pieces to clean a spill.
customer_reviews.author: PizzaIzBack

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality paper
customer_reviews.text: My wife was very critical of the quality and absorbancy of the towel. I bought it because our regular brand raised prices. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: icepro

customer_reviews.title: The Coronavirus has turned people stupid!
customer_reviews.text: Item was stolen by the driver and said it was signed for!
customer_reviews.author: TBD User

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced - not double rolls
customer_reviews.text: I would not say these are anything close to double rolls...they are the size of regular rolls but are double the money. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: IMHO, Sparkle paper towels provide the best value for the money. They aren't as soft or as absorbent as blue shop towels, but they get the job done. I've used them for years and am very happy with them. I LOVE being able to select the size for each use!
customer_reviews.author: Shortie1969

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of them, was hooked on the same brand for a lot of years. Could not find my regular brand and had to have some paper towels so I tried these. Perfect, will drop my old brand ASAP. These are high quality towels. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: LGB

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: these paper towels are not good, they do not work well. I use paper towel for a ton of things, and usually get brawny, or bounty, and comparatively these are super disappointing. I bought them because of the shortage of things and figured maybe I would spend less, but I will go back to buying brawney for sure.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: They smell
customer_reviews.text: As a paper towel it’s good I’ve gotten these a lot of times but will not order again because they usually smell like eggs I thought it was me but I let a few other people smell them and everybody thought they have a strange smell to them I’m not sure if this is safe or not so I will not be ordering again. has a paper towel it’s good I’ve gotten these a lot of times but will not order again unless they can explain to me why they smell .
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: I needed these, I want never buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Sparkle from my local store years ago and needed some paper towels shipped to my home so I ordered this thinking that it would be a good value. WRONG! The were super thin, over priced and not worth what I had paid for them. Dollar store paper towels would have probably been better than these.
customer_reviews.author: T84

customer_reviews.title: Better options available
customer_reviews.text: Not as durable or absorbent as some of the more prominent brands, however my biggest complaint is that an excessive about of glue was used to attach the paper towels to the cardboard roll, making the last several layers of paper towels useless, as they were covered in glue. All the rolls have been the same. Not sure if this was a bad batch or if it’s common.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: didn't absorb well
customer_reviews.text: Had to use many more towels than with Bounty. I have used only Bounty for years; thought I'd try something else. Not a good idea with a puppy. If you don't need to pick up piles of liquid and just use for napkins, these would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: yavonnie

customer_reviews.title: Stress
customer_reviews.text: I recieved an email ,that said my item was out of stock ,and that it would not be delivered this month. The top of the email was in magenta ,and not the usual color. The color that shows that you've already googled something. I noticed this magenta getting stuck, when I had a problem signing into a d.n.a. sight Schizophrenia is associated ,with conflicting signals ,nicht wahr? Fortunately I procrastinated. Gaslighters? City government?
customer_reviews.author: keith dunipace

customer_reviews.title: why do all the paper towels from amazon smell like cleaners?
customer_reviews.text: i am not sure if all sparkle paper towels smell like cleaners but im thinking its just paper towels from the amazon warehouse in houston because i bought a different brand before and it had the same smell. until you guys stop storing paper towels next to strong smelling cleaning supplies (aka fabuloso), i will be buying them from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office and these work great. They are very sturdy and we all especially like the select-a-size. They are very absorbent, which is probably why they are a tad stiff, but all in all they work GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much for the wonderful buying experience! My shipped not only was a great deal but it was fast, and it came in perfect packaging! Everything went great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have a really gross fishy odor
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels continue to smell very fishy and nasty I used to have them every month delivered and I stopped for a while but I thought I would try it again and they still smell gross 🙁😏 I don’t know where they’re getting their materials but hopefully it’s not in the bottom of the ocean ... or in a nasty aquarium ....
customer_reviews.author: Laura Houzenga

customer_reviews.title: It is Angel Soft T.P.
customer_reviews.text: Its a 2-Ply name brand TP. Known for it's qualities over single ply offerings. Happy to have gotten it! Possibly overpriced during the COVID-19 'conflagration', hence the 3 stars on "Value for Money"
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Box of Sparkle Paper Towels was labeled as containing 18 rolls, but contained only 9 rolls.
customer_reviews.text: I was charged $28.99 for 18 rolls of these paper towels, but when the box arrived, it contained only 9 rolls (3 packages. each containing 3 rolls). The 3 packages clearly didn't fill the box, the exterior surface of which stated that the box contained 18 rolls. Worse still, the Amazon interface allows one only to "return or replace" item that has been delivered. I don't want to do either; I want the order to be properly filled. Evidently, wherever the item was packaged, the box was filled with only half of the product. This is the 5th or 6th time I've ordered this quantity, and previously, the box was completely full and contained 18 rolls.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: The worst paper towels you can buy. Very thin and smells like a wet dog. Each sheet is like 3/4 the size of a normal sheet and you need about 4 of them to dry your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Fischer

customer_reviews.title: The smell and where you found this batch of paper
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where this came from but it smells like dead fish As soon as I can get my hands on some bounty paper towels these thing are being thrown away I have to wash my hands after I use this and is a terrycloth to wipe it Horrible smell
customer_reviews.author: annmarie avery

customer_reviews.title: Rough paper towel that dries
customer_reviews.text: These are good for drying but are very stiff. When my hands are dry from the cold and I use these they actually hurt my hands. They hurt my face too if I use them on it. I like the generic members mark brand from Sam’s club way better
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: The paper towels are fine. They are what I expected. My issue was with the delivery. I came home to find the package at the edge of my lawn. The box was dented and the package had broken open like it had been tossed there. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Tony's

customer_reviews.title: Repulsive smell
customer_reviews.text: not sure why is there a smell. Must be sitting in some fishery factory before shipping them out.
customer_reviews.author: UZ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: When I clean or pick something up I want it to strong , absorbed, and don’t have to use the roll to get the job done. That what these do for us
customer_reviews.author: Jpsjeep

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Crappy compared to Costco Papertowles. Have to use double to do the same job. I will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPro 400

customer_reviews.title: Not good for #2s
customer_reviews.text: Mr sparkle. Yeah right. This stuff is good absorbing liquids, but it smeared my kids vomit and turds all over the floor. Maybe I should have used the swipe and scoop method, but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: Not the softest but best value
customer_reviews.text: Great paper towels. Definitely best value for money. Not the softest but since im cleaning up messes with them and then throwing them away not really a top priority when compared to value.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy and would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: There is no absorbency with this product. You have to use too much paper towel to wipe up a spill. Not a good buy and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Babs1

customer_reviews.title: The Good Old Days...Name Brand Toiletries.
customer_reviews.text: I remember the days where I could buy Sparkle paper towels.... *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: cheap but work for basic messes
customer_reviews.text: We have cats, so there's the occasional mess to clean up. I wanted cheap, but workable paper towels. This works just fine for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels were definitely not up to par. You really do get what you pay for. Spend you’re money on a better brand!
customer_reviews.author: Deenie

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: Definitely thinner and tear more easily than Target or Bounty paper towels, but they're not terrible and right now it's almost impossible to get normal paper towels in the store - so these fill the gap alright in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good quality overall
customer_reviews.text: Good quality paper towel. The pick a size feature is very useful. I wish it can absorb water even better.
customer_reviews.author: K Dad

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money delivered to your door, has never been damaged, no issues always the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: What a JOKE!
customer_reviews.text: These rolls of tp are about half the size of a real roll of tp. They look like they'd fit best in a half scale play house. Don't buy these. Keep looking. There's nothing going on here.
customer_reviews.author: Sea_monkeys_have_feelings_too

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are far from a bounty brand but they are worth the price. I noticed using a few more sheets for certain jobs but would use again if I noticed them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Amazon to the Rescue!!!
customer_reviews.text: When no one else had any Paper Towels in stock, Amazon did and the delivery was fast. These towels are durable, I’m a first time user of this brand and I like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Paper Towels.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know really what to say about paper towels, but these are them and they do the things you might expect from paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Product is not the same!!!! Dollar store quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this particular brand for x5 because it was a good product. But for some reason the paper towel that I ordered last Oct 16 was thinner and don't absorb well! It's like I bought paper towel from dollar store. The packaging is different too!!! Amazon people please check your products before sending it to your prime members.
customer_reviews.author: Myra M.

customer_reviews.title: ON par with Presto
customer_reviews.text: So I've used these and Presto. So far I haven't noticed a major difference. So I'd suggest going with whichever one is cost effective at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Drakelb

customer_reviews.title: Wait for better
customer_reviews.text: It takes several of these to clean up a spill that Bounty or other higher rated towels does in a flash. We will use them as there are few alternatives. But, if there are, move to them as we will once the supply chain gets better.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Reifer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered every two weeks, same items. Price writhin a few dollars.
customer_reviews.text: Always got the item Iwanted and is always worked 100% of the time. I continue to order at least by the case.
customer_reviews.author: DrBarron

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: Though they feel flimsy, the paper towels do the job. It was nice to use when my favorite brand was not available during the early months of covid.
customer_reviews.author: MimiSS

customer_reviews.title: This sparkle is a sparkle
customer_reviews.text: These are great paper towels. They absorb anything and it only takes less sheets. I was very satisfied and plan to buy again. Move over Bounty paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for your money and these paper towels deliver. I buy them all the times and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Great paper towels for the money
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels work really well for what they cost. I get them auto delivered every 3 months, and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: good paper towels
customer_reviews.text: The paper towels are good for wiping down counters and other things. The value is good , I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: John La Rue

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them and found out that they were just as good or better than the ones I have been using previous.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel E. Gates Jr.

customer_reviews.title: bulk
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying product in bulk and will continue to do so when it is available
customer_reviews.author: Basile 9403

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo APPRECIATIVE
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo APPRECIATIVE For these Paper Towels during this Pandemic & they didn’t over Charge #Bonus 😉👍
customer_reviews.author: Serene Williams

customer_reviews.title: Have had them through subscribe and save for a long time
customer_reviews.text: They absorb quickly and hold up when saturated. They do the job.
customer_reviews.author: One Person's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: So thin. Not absorbent.
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels or so thin that I need two of the sheets to get my hands dry
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Between kids and pets these help clean up many messes throughout the day. I have a subscription that comes monthly and it’s the best decision I’ve made! These are great!
customer_reviews.author: charlee

customer_reviews.title: Got what I needed when I needed it
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels do work well. They arrived fairly quickly as well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: buglady

customer_reviews.title: wonderful  Paper towels
customer_reviews.text: So glad we are no longer paper towel empty! TY
customer_reviews.author: LLA

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to what was ordered. Was definitely not SPARKLE!!! Fasley advertised!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Great towels but I’m finding the price is going up.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Not very absorbant
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 sheets of sparkle to 1 bounty. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Avid shopper

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love having my paper towel delivered to my door. For some reason this aisle always gets skipped by me at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Not absorbent, requires too much of a roll to clean anything.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best. Far cry from the worst. Great value for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Performance/Good value
customer_reviews.text: I get a case of these every month. I find them absorbent and just thick enough. I like being able to pull exactly how much I need for the job at hand - 2 squares to dry my hands, 3 squares to spray and clean my sliding door.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning and hand drying.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly cleaning windows, mirrors, my tv screens, glass tables, drying dishes,etc. Drying hands and wiping out the basin in the bathroom after washing hands and cleaning. Also drying my crystal glasses after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Shuggah

customer_reviews.title: Package soaked in beer
customer_reviews.text: Just a FYI- my package arrived with the box soaking wet in what clearly smelled like beer.
customer_reviews.author: Daveandlani

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: The best thing is that they were in stock. That is great in these times.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W. Ovella

customer_reviews.title: Smells really bad. Like wet fish dumpster
customer_reviews.text: Yes it does the job of wiping up mess, not well but good enough. Smells horrible. Made mistake of drying my hands with these and my hands smelled like dirty dumpster with food scraps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: The smell reminds me of wet dog. Disgusting to use for eating, or around food.
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quantity
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. Great absorbency. Just as good as Bounty or any other brand and an excellent quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Order these all the time
customer_reviews.text: I order these on the regular. Good price per roll. Half sheets!
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Order this product quite often. Strong and absorbent paper towels. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Nasty smell.
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper smells disgusting. It smells like eggs. I don’t know what type of paper they used.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Ali

customer_reviews.title: These paper towels literally stink
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels have an unpleasant odor that I’ve not encountered with other brands. The smell overwhelms any other attribute (other than, possibly, availability during Covid inspired hoarding). I wouldn’t repurchase given availability of alternate brands.
customer_reviews.author: H Roarke

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The value on this product is quantity for price, bounty is better at doing its job but for the price it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: SUBSCRIBE AND SAVERS BEWARE / Fewer Rolls in Subscribe and Save box.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon, sneaky as they are, reduced the number of rolls in the subscribe and save box from 24 to 18. Which isn't a huge deal if the price reflected that change, but it does not. Nearly the same price for 6 less rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I go through a lot of paper towels at my airbnb property. These work great & at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: me...

customer_reviews.title: They work and last long!
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs rather well. 18 rolls Last about 3 months. Comes in a big box with easy to store packs.
customer_reviews.author: JOE DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy
customer_reviews.text: My wife makes me write these reviews . I'm getting typing tired . Help me Amazon !!
customer_reviews.author: Martin David Barber

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The only paper towel I've ever used that doesn't leave lint behind when you clean glass
customer_reviews.author: KimB

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Work great and getting in bulk makes it so I never run out

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the amount you get. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best paper towels I have ever had, and 1 case lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Jonette M Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Came fast.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this perches of Sparkle paper towels. They are my favorite. Ant the price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good paper towels fot the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good paper towels and not as expensive a lot of paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Love these paper towels
customer_reviews.text: If you do a lot of cleaning with paper towels, these are best value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Connie DuBiel

customer_reviews.title: good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to order bulk items like toilet paper from Amazon - it saves our office time and me the hassle of going to the store and carrying things like giant packs of paper towels. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Awful paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Awful paper towels. Thin and barely absorb drips of water on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Not disappointed one bit. We go through a lot of paper towels and these are economical and perfect
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: The value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a while. It works good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

product_meta.title: Sparkle Paper Towels, 18 = 37 Regular Rolls, Modern White, Pick-a-Size Plus
product_meta.description: Clean any size mess with Sparkle Pick A Size Plus paper towels—NOW with wider Pick A Size sheets! Sparkle Pick A Size Plus paper towels deliver a little something extra without breaking the bank. Sparkle Paper Towels in Modern White are 2 ply paper towels with Thirst Pockets – specifically designed to be strong and absorbent. Sparkle Paper Towels Modern White have Pick A Size paper towel sheets to clean any mess big or small. This pack of Sparkle Paper Towels Modern White includes 18 rolls of 2 ply Pick A Size Plus Modern White paper towels that are equivalent to 37 regular rolls. They work perfectly to clean everyday messes and brighten up your home whether in the kitchen, garage, or bathroom. Sparkle Paper Towels Modern White offer all you need to shine at an affordable price and are the perfect towels for clean up all over the house. From the kitchen to the bathroom, on a paper towel holder, or on the countertop, you’ll absorb moisture and leave counters and mirrors streak free—for a house that shines every time! On top of all of that, Sparkle Paper Towels Modern White are a big help for food preparation and cooking, to clean glass, kitchen counters, bathroom vanities, appliances, make up brushes, or keep in your car for any on the go emergency occasion. And so, we ask: Why pay more for everyday little messes?
feature_bullets: Clean any size mess with Sparkle Pick A Size Plus paper towels : Now with wider Pick A Size sheets
Sparkle Pick A Size Plus paper towels with 115 2 ply sheets per roll deliver a little something extra without breaking the bank
Wider sheets are perfectly sized for food prep, Holding more chips, place-mats, Large hands & more
Use our wider 2 ply Pick A Size sheets on kitchen and bathroom counters, floors, mirrors and more
Bulk value Pack Includes 18 Pick A Size Plus Rolls (equal to 37 Sparkle Regular Rolls) in Modern White
